text: It's not some great work of beauty and love to be a rock-and-roll singer.
author: Robert Plant

text: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
author: Havelock Ellis

text: The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers.
author: Roy Ayers

text: Walk on a rainbow trail walk on a trail of song, and all about you will be beauty. There is a way out of every dark mist, over a rainbow trail.
author: Robert Motherwell

text: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form.
author: Joan Crawford
